room_title: Escape room "The Bank Heist" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: Fun experience for the whole family.  Whether you escape or not enjoyment is guaranteed.  Nice staff and Andrew is hilarious and great help.

room_title: Escape room "The Bank Heist" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: Fun room, but not as difficult as expected. My girlfriend and I were able to complete it by ourselves. If your looking for more of a challenge at this location try the Mission Space room.

room_title: Escape room "The Bank Heist" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: We had a blast today in the heist room we were almost apart of the 1%!! I'm definitely going back!

room_title: Escape room "The Bank Heist" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: This is the best escape room I have ever been to! I have been to many and the service and creativity this facility exudes is beyond compare!!!! Great team, great rooms !

room_title: Escape room "The Bank Heist" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: I've been to four of their rooms now. The atmosphere, props, decor etc. are great. There are many clues, puzzles and opportunities for everyone in the group to contribute something. It's a bit easier if you know your whole group already, but working with strangers can be fun too.
